mapper.delete: /* 파일 카테고리 삭제 */ DELETE FROM tb_fileboard_category WHERE file_category_code=#{fileCategoryCode};
mapper.update: /* 파일카테고리 수정 */ UPDATE tb_fileboard_category SET file_category_name=#{fileCategoryName}, file_category_modifier=#{fileCategoryModifier}, file_category_modification_date=NOW() WHERE file_category_code=#{fileCategoryCode};
mapper.select: /* 파일 카테고리 상세보기 */ SELECT file_category_code AS fileCategoryCode, file_category_name AS fileCategoryName, file_category_registrant AS fileCategoryRegistrant, file_category_reg_date AS fileCategoryRegDate, file_category_modifier AS fileCategoryModifier, file_category_modification_date AS fileCategoryModificationDate FROM tb_fileboard_category WHERE file_category_code = #{fileCategoryCode};

/* 파일 카테고리 코드, 이름 조회 및 중복제거 */ SELECT DISTINCT fc.file_category_code ,fc.file_category_name FROM tb_fileboard_category AS fc LEFT JOIN tb_file_board AS f ON fc.file_category_code = f.file_category_code;
mapper.delete: /* 파일 게시글 삭제 */ DELETE FROM tb_file_board WHERE file_board_num = #{fileBoardNum};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_file_board AS f INNER JOIN tb_position_list AS p ON f.file_board_registrant = p.position_member_num INNER JOIN tb_department_list AS d ON p.position_member_num = d.member_num INNER JOIN tb_member AS m ON d.member_num = m.member_num WHERE file_category_code = #{serviceType};

/* 파일게시글 전체 목록 조회 */ SELECT * FROM tb_file_board AS f INNER JOIN tb_position_list AS p ON f.file_board_registrant = p.position_member_num INNER JOIN tb_department_list AS d ON p.position_member_num = d.member_num INNER JOIN tb_member AS m ON d.member_num = m.member_num;
SELECT fc.file_category_name ,fc.file_category_registrant FROM tb_fileboard_category AS fc WHERE file_category_code = #{fileCategoryCode};
